WHERE 1=1
AND A.healthindex = #{sch_healthindex}
AND A.healthtitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sch_healthtitle},'%')
AND A.healthcontent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sch_healthcontent},'%')
AND (A.healthcontent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchvalue},'%') OR A.healthtitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchvalue},'%') )
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.regtime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{sch_usestartdate},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.regtime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{sch_useenddate},'%Y%m%d')
AND A.regid = #{sch_specialid}
AND B.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sch_name},'%')
AND B.telephonee LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sch_telephone},'%')
AND B.handphone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sch_handphone},'%')
AND B.job LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sch_job},'%')
AND B.specialty LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sch_specialty},'%')
AND B.belongto = #{sch_belongto}
AND B.career = #{sch_career}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.healthindex, A.healthtitle, A.regid, B.name, B.telephone, B.handphone, B.job, B.specialty, B.belongto, B.career, B.picturename, A.thumbnailfile, A.healthcontent, A.searchcount, A.heartcount, A.thumbnailfile, DATE_FORMAT( A.regtime,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') "regtime" FROM health A INNER JOIN special_member B ON A.regid = B.specialid
ORDER BY A.regtime DESC
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS cnt FROM health A
SELECT MAX(healthindex) AS lastIndex FROM health A
SELECT MAX(sequencenum) AS lastFileIndex FROM health_file A

SELECT A.healthindex, A.healthtitle, A.regid, B.name, B.telephone, B.handphone, B.job, B.specialty, B.belongto, B.career, B.picturename, A.thumbnailfile, A.healthcontent, A.searchcount, A.heartcount, A.thumbnailfile, DATE_FORMAT(A.regtime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') "regtime" FROM health A LEFT OUTER JOIN special_member B ON A.regid = B.specialid
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.healthindex = #{healthindex}

SELECT A.healthindex, DATE_FORMAT(A.regtime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') "regtime", A.sequencenum, A.pictureorder, A.filename
FROM health_file A
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.healthindex = #{healthindex} ORDER BY A.pictureorder ASC
